events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection. Initial details were provided.
Based on the report, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as the vehicle sustained visible damage from the collision.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case promptly, ensuring the policyholder's concerns will be addressed efficiently.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the claimant with details about the next steps and documents required for processing.
Request sent to the claimant asking for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with investigation.
Claimant submitted the police accident report along with clear photographs and an official repair estimate from a licensed garage.
The investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted documents and contacted the garage for confirmation of the repair costs.
Investigation concluded with findings confirming the accident details and verified repair estimates that comply with policy terms.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount covering all repair costs, including towing fees and minor medical expenses.
The claimant responded expressing gratitude for the fair settlement offer and appreciated the clear communication throughout the process.
Formal approval of the claim was granted following agreement on the proposed settlement amount and verification of all required documents.
Payment was successfully issued to the claimant's bank account to cover the costs associated with vehicle repair and ancillary expenses.
Claim file was closed after confirmation that the repairs were completed and the claimant had no further concerns or inquiries.
All relevant claim documents and case history were archived securely for record-keeping and possible future reference.
